publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1584 Rosie Kane: Support for Falun Gong-That the Parliament condemns the Chinese Government for human rights abuses against Falun Gong practitioners; demands that Her Majesty's Government joins it in condemnation of these abuses and in recognising that practitioners of Falun Gong are persecuted inside and outside China; further demands the immediate release of Falun Gong practitioners currently held in China, and supports the peaceful march which will take place in Edinburgh on 1 August 2004 at 12.00 pm from Market Street in opposition to the Chinese army taking part in the military tattoo. Supported by: Mike Pringle*
S2M-1584 Support for Falun Gong (lodged on 15 July 2004) Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1584 Support for Falun Gong (lodged on 15 July 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1584 Support for Falun Gong (lodged on 15 July 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1584 Support for Falun Gong (lodged on 15 July 2004) Donald Gorrie*
